DIA_Proximo_BeforeTournament_13_01: Are you ready for the biggest event in the entire kingdom?
DIA_Proximo_BeforeTournament_13_02: Many weeks of preparation and mountains of gold spent to make this arena a place of spectacular bloodshed.
DIA_Proximo_BeforeTournament_13_03: Warriors from the farthest lands came to show their craft and risk their heads for glory and riches.
DIA_Proximo_BeforeTournament_13_04: And all thanks to our wonderful captain!
DIA_Proximo_BeforeTournament_13_05: So have fun, drink as much as your heads will allow, and don't forget to bet on the fights!
DIA_Proximo_BeforeRound1_13_02: They are young and eager to win. They make up for their lack of training with vigour and cunning tricks.
